comments: Zeller (CHA) extends his hands toward Bey (DET) and marginal contact occurs when Zeller releases to roll toward the lane.
Hayward (CHA) has a grasp of Stewart's (DET) right arm and marginal contact occurs as Stewart contests the driving shot attempt.
Stewart (DET) is moving alongside Hayward's (CHA) path and, as when Hayward veers toward him, absorbs the body contact made during the driving shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) jumps from point A to point B and initiates contact with Grant's (DET) side and right arm, causing him to lose control of the ball during the driving shot attempt.
Stewart (DET) and Washington (CHA) make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.
Ball (CHA) legally contests Mykhailiuk's (DET) jump shot attempt and avoids making contact with Mykhailiuk's head.
Zeller (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Wright's (DET) path and absorbs the contact.

Replay review of the foul called on Mykhailiuk (DET) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Mykhailiuk extends his arm forward and initiates contact with Rozier's (CHA) front after his gather.
Washington (CHA) and Plumlee (DET) engage and disengage with one another off-ball.
Washington (CHA) is in a legal guarding position and absorbs the contact with Grant (DET) as he retreats backwards.
McGruder (DET) and Rozier (CHA) engage and disengage with one another off ball.
Washington (CHA) and Grant (DET) engage and disengage with one another in the lane. Zeller (CHA) and Grant then make incidental contact with one another as Grant begins moving toward the perimeter.
Washington (CHA) is turning slightly as marginal body contact occurs with Wright (DET) during the drive.
McGruder (DET) brings his arm toward Rozier's (CHA) front and marginal contact occurs after Rozier's gather.
Rozier (CHA) has a grasp of McGruder's (DET) right arm and marginal contact occurs before Rozier quickly releases.
Plumlee (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in Zeller's (CHA) path and absorbs the contact.
Grant (DET) fumbles the inbound pass without establishing control and legally goes into the back-court to retrieve it.
Zeller (CHA) legally contests Grant's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) and Plumlee (DET) engage and disengage with one another during rebounding.
Ball (CHA) moves into Grant (DET) and initiates body contact during Grant's upward shooting motion.
Hayward (CHA) and Bey (DET) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Rozier (CHA) and Bey (DET) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
